metadata.feature_description: Analytics for discussion forums showing thread activity and participation metrics

steps.action: Navigate to PersonaBar > Dashboard > Community Analytics
steps.expected: Community Analytics dashboard loads with module selector tabs
steps.actual: Community Analytics dashboard loaded successfully with Answers, Blogs, Discussions, Events, Ideas, and Wiki tabs visible

steps.expected: Dashboard switches to Discussions module showing discussion-specific metrics
steps.actual: Discussions tab selected and dashboard displays Community Health section with Topics-specific metrics (Topics older than 24 hours without Replies, Topics with no Views, Topics with Views but no Interaction)

steps.action: View the Engagement section on Discussions dashboard
steps.expected: Engagement metrics displayed showing interaction rates for discussions
steps.actual: Engagement section visible with Interacted, Formed Relationship, and Shared metrics. Chart displays engagement data over time with percentage values

steps.action: Review Community Health metrics for topic activity
steps.expected: Metrics showing topic activity states (with replies, views, interactions)
steps.actual: Community Health section displays 4 metric cards: Topics older than 24 hours without Replies (0%), Topics older than 6 hours with no Views (0%), Topics older than 12 hours with Views but no Interaction (0%), and a 4th metric accessible via scroll. Each shows current and comparative term percentages

steps.action: Scroll down to view Popular Content section
steps.expected: Popular content list showing ranked discussion threads
steps.actual: Popular Content section displayed with message 'There is no popular content at the moment.' indicating no popular content exists yet but the feature is working correctly. Trending Tags section also visible

steps.action: Compare Discussions metrics to other modules (Answers, Blogs)
steps.expected: Discussions module shows Topics-related metrics rather than Questions (Answers) or Posts (Blogs)
steps.actual: Verified Discussions-specific terminology: Community Health shows 'Topics older than 24 hours without Replies', 'Topics older than 6 hours with no Views', 'Topics older than 12 hours with Views but no Interaction' - confirming the dashboard adapts its labels and metrics specifically for the Discussions module

steps.action: Click on the period selector dropdown
steps.expected: Period options displayed (Day, Week, Month, Year, Custom)
steps.actual: Period dropdown opened showing Day, Week, Month, Year, and Custom options

steps.action: Select Month period to change the time range
steps.expected: Dashboard updates to show monthly data range and comparative term changes
steps.actual: Dashboard successfully updated - date range changed from '2 Feb 2026 - 8 Feb 2026' (Week) to '9 Jan 2026 - 8 Feb 2026' (Month). Comparative Term dropdown changed from '1 w' to '1 m'. Charts display monthly date ranges

observations: The Community Analytics dashboard is a combined dashboard supporting multiple social modules (Answers, Blogs, Discussions, Social Events, Ideas, Wiki) with module-specific metrics adapting based on selection
No discussion content exists in the test environment, resulting in 0% across all Community Health metrics - this is expected behavior for a clean/new installation
The Export button is available on the dashboard for exporting analytics data
Comparative Term feature allows comparing current period data against previous periods (1d, 1w, 1m, 1y depending on selected period)

The Discussions module-specific metrics focus on 'Topics' terminology (Topics without Replies, Topics with no Views, Topics with Views but no Interaction) which correctly differentiates from Answers module (Questions) and Blogs module (Posts)
